text: Niima ziɛgi zu, à mina ɓɔɠɔ yɛ ná Ezekiase ʋa wo ɠaka, é mina wo ɠigaanɛ ga naama zii! À mina ʋoluzei ba, mazɔlɔɔ zooi tanɔpɛ ɓaa masadai tanɔpɛ ná-gala ge la zooni é ʋa ná-nuɓusɛiti kula nà ɓɔɠɔi zèa, ɓaa kɛ̀wolani zea. Wa-ɠalagiti ɓalaa ti la zooga wo unmɔɔsu, ti ʋa wo ɠula gi ya!› »
